title: The Search for meaning
creator_credit: Michael Norton and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Presented by Caroline Jones, whose compassionate questioning elicits responses of great honesty, this program features well-known Australians talking about their search for meaning. Guests include, Maina Gielgud - Artistic Director of the Australian Ballet; Stan Arneil - ex-prisoner-of- war; Rene Rivkin - business tycoon; ceramic artist Cybele Rowe; psychologist Dr. Ron Farmer; and naturopath, Dorothy Hall.
